conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: I'm going to lie to you about something important.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: Because I want to get what I want, and I don't care about your feelings.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: I don't care. I'm going to do it anyway.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: But what if I find out?

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: You won't. I'm too good at lying.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: I don't know, Alice. This seems really wrong.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: It's not wrong. It's just business.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: I don't know if I can do this.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: Then you're out of the deal.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: The deal that's going to make us both a lot of money.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: I don't know, Alice. This is starting to sound like a scam.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: It's not a scam. It's a legitimate business opportunity.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: I don't know. I need some time to think about this.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: Fine. But don't take too long. This opportunity won't last forever.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: I know. I'll let you know what I decide.
